thread.title: RPT-Board of Brazil's Vale approves second dividend payment
thread.title_full: RPT-Board of Brazil's Vale approves second dividend payment | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: RPT-Board of Brazil's Vale approves second dividend payment
text:
(Repeats to add dropped word to headline)
RIO DE JANEIRO Oct 15 (Reuters) - Brazilian miner Vale SA said on Thursday its board approved the payment of a second dividend installment this year of $500 million.
The sum was proposed by the company's executive committee last month. (Reporting by Stephen Eisenhammer)
